title: Run fresh data ingestion — data 30 days stale
description: Run a fresh data ingestion from Cricsheet to update the DuckDB database. Current data is approximately 30 days stale. Download latest Cricsheet ZIP files, run ingest.py, verify row counts in fact_ball and dim tables, regenerate all downstream outputs (analytics views, stat packs, depth charts, predicted XIs). Blocked by TKT-245 (ingest.yml fix).

florentino_gate.reason: Data freshness critical for all downstream outputs.

deliverables: scripts/core/analytics_ipl.py views materialized on fresh data
